headline.print_headline: South Korea's Mirim Lee Wins Meijer LPGA Classic
headline.main: South Korea's Mirim Lee Wins Meijer LPGA Classic

docs.snippet: Mirim Lee won the Meijer LPGA Classic on Sunday for her first LPGA Tour victory, beating fellow South Korean player Inbee Park with a birdie on the second hole of a playoff....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mirim Lee won the Meijer LPGA Classic on Sunday for her first LPGA Tour victory, beating fellow South Korean player Inbee Park with a birdie on the second hole of a playoff.

headline.print_headline: New York Governor, Other Officials Head to Israel
headline.main: New York Governor, Other Officials Head to Israel

docs.snippet: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo and top state legislators are heading to Israel this week for a two-day visit as a "demonstration of solidarity" with that country in the conflict in Gaza, the Democratic governor announced Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo and top state legislators are heading to Israel this week for a two-day visit as a "demonstration of solidarity" with that country in the conflict in Gaza, the Democratic governor announced Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Barbosa, Fittipaldi Win at Road America
headline.main: Barbosa, Fittipaldi Win at Road America

docs.snippet: Joao Barbosa and Christian Fittipaldi won the TUDOR United SportsCar Championship race at Road America on Sunday for their third victory of the year in Action Express Racing's No. 5 Corvette....
docs.lead_paragraph: Joao Barbosa and Christian Fittipaldi won the TUDOR United SportsCar Championship race at Road America on Sunday for their third victory of the year in Action Express Racing's No. 5 Corvette.

headline.sub: Warm welcome in Kirkuk for convoy of Kurdish fighters
headline.main: Warm welcome in Kirkuk for convoy of Kurdish fighters

docs.snippet: A convoy of Kurdish forces said to be fighters from the PKK's armed wing get a warm welcome as they arrive in Kirkuk to bolster defenses against Islamic State militants. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: A convoy of Kurdish forces said to be fighters from the PKK's armed wing get a warm welcome as they arrive in Kirkuk to bolster defenses against Islamic State militants. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.print_headline: Mine Spill Forces Water Cutbacks in North Mexico
headline.main: Mine Spill Forces Water Cutbacks in North Mexico

docs.snippet: About 10 million gallons (40,000 cubic meters) of contaminated wastewater have spilled into rivers from a mine in northern Mexico, and federal officials announced Sunday they are restricting water supply to cities and towns in the country's north,...
docs.lead_paragraph: About 10 million gallons (40,000 cubic meters) of contaminated wastewater have spilled into rivers from a mine in northern Mexico, and federal officials announced Sunday they are restricting water supply to cities and towns in the country's north, including the Sonora state capital of Hermosillo.

headline.print_headline: Egypt's President on First Visit to Saudi Arabia
headline.main: Egypt's President on First Visit to Saudi Arabia

docs.snippet: Egypt's President Abdel-Fattah el-Sissi met late Sunday in Saudi Arabia with one of his strongest international supporters, King Abdullah, to talk about key security issues impacting the region....
docs.lead_paragraph: Egypt's President Abdel-Fattah el-Sissi met late Sunday in Saudi Arabia with one of his strongest international supporters, King Abdullah, to talk about key security issues impacting the region.

docs.snippet: We can’t assume that a cow raised for food experiences what a slave or victim of genocide does....
docs.abstract: We can’t assume that a cow raised for food experiences what a slave or victim of genocide does.

headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: LA Woman Punched by Patrolman Speaks
headline.main: APNewsBreak: LA Woman Punched by Patrolman Speaks

docs.snippet: Marlene Pinnock said she thought she was going to die as a California Highway Patrol officer straddled her, repeatedly punching her head on the side of a Los Angeles freeway....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marlene Pinnock said she thought she was going to die as a California Highway Patrol officer straddled her, repeatedly punching her head on the side of a Los Angeles freeway.

headline.print_headline: UK Employers Expect Scant Upturn in Wages-Survey
headline.main: UK Employers Expect Scant Upturn in Wages-Survey

docs.snippet: British employers expect wage growth to remain weak, according to a survey of personnel managers on Monday that contrasted with other reports that salaries are set to rise at a faster pace....
docs.lead_paragraph: British employers expect wage growth to remain weak, according to a survey of personnel managers on Monday that contrasted with other reports that salaries are set to rise at a faster pace.

headline.print_headline: From 'Mr Copper' to Lord Farmer, Metals Trading Legend Becomes British Peer
headline.main: From 'Mr Copper' to Lord Farmer, Metals Trading Legend Becomes British Peer

docs.snippet: Michael Farmer, among the world's most famous metals traders and a newly named baron of the British House of Lords, has no intention of abandoning the market that earned him his fortune and his first title: Mr Copper....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Farmer, among the world's most famous metals traders and a newly named baron of the British House of Lords, has no intention of abandoning the market that earned him his fortune and his first title: Mr Copper.
